revised_title: Anatomy and Classification of Heterophyllia, Battersbyia, Palaeocyclus, and Asterosmilia in Sclerodermic Zoantharia
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and classification of four genera of sclerodermic Zoantharia, specifically Heterophyllia, Battersbyia, Palaeocyclus, and Asterosmilia. They describe the unique characteristics of each species, including their corallum structure, costae, septa, and endotheca. The author also discusses the reproduction methods and the position of these genera in the classification of the Madreporaria.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Paleontology
